recipesJson.name: Big time guava remix
recipesJson.author: Tvsty1
recipesJson.description:
Got given a bottle of this, it's tasty but I'm 99% sure it's just cap sweet guava & alot of sweetener.

So I decided to remix it & give a bit more depth.

Cap sweet guava gives us the bulk of are flavour, it also provides a nice sweetness. 

WF Malaysian Guava turns sweet guava from a syrup to a more realistic guava. 

Flv pink guava provides us with a touch of brightness, lifting the whole recipe. 

If you want it more "premium" then add some cap super sweet (0.5-0.75%)

This also works great with Ws23.
